alert.note: Alert for Denton; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 11:14PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wise and northwestern Denton Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1114 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Decatur, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Denton, Sanger, Krum, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, Bolivar, Greenwood, Slidell, Stony and Lake Ray Roberts. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 470 and 481. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
